ftbquests.chapter.16AFC8ED236C979B.quest: §6Discord: §dhttps://discord.gg/CVsAWVay
§bThe Sanctuary: El_mal (玩建筑的牢E)
§bTerrain: wonderful艾辰
§bCustom Animations: merlin204
§bCustom Art: Ao, 一只路过的小吴, XVIII-ling§r
§bAnd: All the excellent mod, resource pack, and shader pack authors
——P1nero

Thanks to all the companions who have walked this path with me! Thanks to all the excellent mod authors! This is my second modpack. If you're interested in simulation management, you can try my other modpack:
§a《SkilletMan》§r!
The name 'The Casket of Reveries' was originally thought up by my friend. At that time, we planned to create a mod that would go down in history, but for some reasons we didn't make it to the end...
§6《The Casket of Reveries》 means sealing beautiful things in an exquisite little box to slumber, just like the ruins we descended upon.§r

Friends who have played §a《SkilletMan》§r should know that I personally don't like cramming all quest storylines and interactions into the FTB interface. Therefore, in this modpack, FTB quests will play more of an encyclopedia role, gradually unlocking through interactions in the world. Our story development and item collection are mainly presented through NPC dialogues.

I also don't like blindly piling up mods. The hostile boss mods used in the main storyline of this modpack are more suitable for interaction with Epic Fight. This modpack uses the latest Epic Fight 12, bringing you a brand-new Epic Fight experience, proving the great potential of Epic Fight.
§bAcknowledgments:
"Legend says there are ruins in the deep sea, watching over this world"
This modpack is in the testing phase. The Sanctuary is still not complete, and some areas are locked (There really are no hidden treasure chests!)
If no other chapters appear, go explore nearby～

§6This modpack will not charge you any fees! It is only released on the CurseForge platform. Third-party distribution is strictly prohibited! Any third-party reposting (including using cloud drives) is an infringement! Welcome to report!§r
Author's Words
ftbquests.chapter.16AFC8ED236C979B.title: Prologue
ftbquests.chapter.522B859BEE1EDD88.quest: Put the §bCosmetic Template§r into the §dCosmetic Repository§r to take out the cosmetics we like.
Afterwards, use the §6Cosmetic Inlay Table§r, or press §6[ctrl + p]§r by default to open the cosmetic slot and decorate yourself.
Right-click the §dGlobal Repository§r block to select your favorite cosmetics from the §bGlobal Cosmetic Repository§r and download the cosmetic files to your §alocal§r device.
The oracle has revealed ancient transformation techniques. Now it's time to dress up properly!
Use the §6Inlay Workbench§r to bind cosmetics and items together, allowing us to use different cosmetics with different weapons.

ftbquests.chapter.5A7C68B10CEA5C38.quest: §bSword Flight§r is the main way to travel in this modpack.
Learn §bSword Soaring Skill§r to unleash the flying skill and freely ride your sword through the skies.
Press §6[K]§r by default to view skills
Qi guides the eight wastelands, the sword commands the six harmonies
Soaring on Sword
Soaring on Sword!
The main source of minerals in this modpack comes from defeating monsters.
§dPillagers: Chance to drop Gold Ingots, Diamond Ingots, Netherite Ingots§r
§bAll Enemies: Chance to drop Iron Ingots, Amethyst Shards, Moonlight Crystals§r
Why mine in an adventure pack?
Mineral Explanation
Crafted from [Fish Avoid] drops
§dSkrythe§r is a monster inhabiting high-altitude areas §a(Windswept Gravelly Hills / Gravelly Mountains)§r. Can be tamed using §6Nether Stars§r.
{image:tcrcore:textures/ftb/blue_dragon.png width:160 height:90 align:center}
Tame §dSkrythe§r and ride it through the skies!
Dragon Tamer
In §amost villages§r you will find §6Tu Di Shrines§r, which can guide your way.
Ancient texts say:
Both §6Tu Di Shrines§r and §dTu Di Command Seals§r can be crafted.
Sneak three times near a §6Tu Di Shrine§r to summon the Tu Di.
Place a torch near a §6Tu Di Shrine§r to pray for blessings.
Sincerity leads to efficacy
Tu Di Shrine
Crafted from [Screaming Bat] drops
§bParkour§r is a cool sport that allows us to easily climb three-block high places, overcome obstacles, and move more flexibly.
In this modpack, you will experience the charm of §bParkour§r compatibility with §6Epic Fight§r!
§bCommon parkour techniques include:§r
Hold §6[Right-click]§r while jumping to grab onto higher ledges
Press §6[R]§r just before landing to cushion the fall
More exciting techniques can be learned in the Parkour Manual. §cSome parkour keys have been disabled in this modpack to avoid conflicts.§r
Parkour!
Crafted from [Snowflake Spider] drops
Crafted from [Fierce Mushroom] drops
This modpack has the §b"Fast TPA"§r mod installed, enriching the multiplayer experience!
Press §6[Right ALT]§r by default to launch a distress signal!
You can customize the distress signal text and the text when going to assist.
"I'll help you!"
Fast TPA
§aRibbit§r is a very cute creature, but besides being cute, it's not very useful.
Of course, besides Ribbit, there are many §eexotic beasts§r in the world. Their drops can be crafted into various §dmagic treasures§r!
The oracle reveals the remaining creatures in the world that have not yet been corrupted by the Black Tide.
Oracle Unlocked
Under divine guidance, people learned how to weave elytra, no longer needing to go to the End.
